title: Alex Azar
added: Following the storming of the Capitol on January 6 2021, Azar resigned his position as Health and Human Services Secretary on January 15 2021, effective January 20 2021 - citing that Donald Trump played a role in inciting the insurrection to halt the affirmation of President Biden’s Electoral College win.

title: Alex Azar
added: Following the storming of the Capitol on January 6 2021, Azar resigned his position as[[Secretary ofHealth and Human Services]]on January 15 2021, effective January 20 2021 - citing that Donald Trump played a role in inciting the insurrection to halt the affirmation of President Biden’s Electoral College win.

title: Alex Azar
added: On January 12, 2021, Azar submitted his letter of resignation, effective January 20, 2021. In his letter, he cited the January 6 [[2021 storming of the United States Capitol|attack on the U.S. Capitol]] and the president's slow response to condemn it. As January 20, 2021 is also the inauguration day of President-elect [[Joe Biden]], the resignation has been characterized as symbolic.<ref>{{Cite news|last=Staff|first=Reuters|date=2021-01-16|title=U.S. health secretary Azar resigns, cites Capitol attack: CNN|language=en|work=Reuters|url=https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-trump-azar-idUSKBN29L02H|access-date=2021-01-16}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web|last=Lee|first=Bruce Y.|title=HHS Secretary Alex Azar Submits ‘Resignation Letter,’ Effective January 20, Inauguration Day|url=https://www.forbes.com/sites/brucelee/2021/01/16/hhs-secretary-alex-azar-submits-resignation-letter-effective-january-20-inauguration-day/|access-date=2021-01-16|website=Forbes|language=en}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web|title=Alex Azar resigns as Health and Human Services Secretary, citing Capitol mob|url=https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/politics-news/alex-azar-resigns-health-human-services-secretary-citing-capitol-mob-n1254500|access-date=2021-01-16|website=NBC News|language=en}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web|last=CNN|first=Maggie Fox|title=HHS Secretary Alex Azar complains of tarnished legacy in resignation letter to Trump|url=https://www.cnn.com/2021/01/15/politics/alex-azar-resigns/index.html|access-date=2021-01-16|website=CNN}}</ref>
